name: persistence
description: An abstraction library for redis and sentinel connection management

scripts.check-modules: if [ -z "$SKIP_PACKAGE_CHECK" ] && [ ./package.json -nt ./node_modules ]; then echo 'Your node_modules are out of date. Please run "npm update"' && exit 1; fi
scripts.test-redis: ls ./test/*.test.js | xargs -n 1 -t -I {} sh -c 'TEST="{}" npm run test-one'
